nl.inl.util

Class StringUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.util.StringUtil

  • public final class StringUtil
extends Object
    A collection of String-related utility methods and regular expression patterns.

    • Method Detail

      • escapeRegexCharacters

        public static String escapeRegexCharacters(String termStr)
        Escape regex special characters (Pattern.quote() also does this, but this method is needed if you use a different regex engine from Java's, such as with Lucene)
        Parameters:
        termStr - the string to escape characters in
        Returns:
        the escaped string

      • normalizeWhitespace

        public static String normalizeWhitespace(String s)
        Replace adjacent whitespace characters with a single space
        Parameters:
        s - source string
        Returns:
        the result

      • stripAccents

        public static String stripAccents(String input)

        Removes diacritics (~= accents) from a string. The case will not be altered.

        For instance, 'à' will be replaced by 'a'.

        Note that ligatures will be left as is. 

         StringUtils.stripAccents(null)                = null
 StringUtils.stripAccents("")                  = ""
 StringUtils.stripAccents("control")           = "control"
 StringUtils.stripAccents("éclair")     = "eclair"
        NOTE: this method was copied from Apache StringUtils. The only change is precompiling the regular expression for efficiency.
        Parameters:
        input - String to be stripped
        Returns:
        input text with diacritics removed
        Since:
        3.0

      • trimWhitespaceAndPunctuation

        public static String trimWhitespaceAndPunctuation(String input)
        Remove any punctuation and whitespace at the start and end of input.
        Parameters:
        input - the input string
        Returns:
        the string without punctuation or whitespace at the edges.

      • camelCaseToDisplayable

        public static String camelCaseToDisplayable(String camelCaseString,
                                            boolean dashesToSpaces)
        Convert a string from a camel-case "identifier" style to a human-readable version, by putting spaces between words, uppercasing the first letter and lowercasing the rest. E.g. myCamelCaseString becomes "My camel case string".
        Parameters:
        camelCaseString - a string in camel case, i.e. multiple capitalized words glued together.
        dashesToSpaces - if true, also converts dashes and underscores to spaces
        Returns:
        a human-readable version of the input string

      • ordinal

        public static String ordinal(int docNumber)
        For a number n, return a string like "nth". So 1 returns "1st", 2 returns "2nd", and so on.
        Parameters:
        docNumber - number
        Returns:
        ordinal for that number

      • wildcardToRegex

        public static String wildcardToRegex(String wildcard)
        Convert wildcard string to regex string. Adapted from: http://stackoverflow.com/a/28758377
        Parameters:
        wildcard - wildcard pattern
        Returns:
        equivalent regex pattern
